document_data.name: Mythal Recovery
document_data.mainbody: '''''Mythal recovery''''' is an [[abjuration]] [[spell]] used by some [[swordmage]]s to rid themselves of negative effects placed upon them by enemies. When a swordmage casts ''mythal recovery'' he or she turns their [[magic]]al wardings inward, giving them a chance to cast off a hindering effect left upon them by some enemy or other obstacle. The spell is not terribly complex and can be used again after a short rest of a few minutes or more.
